wikipedia_page.main: Hector Carsewell Macpherson  (16 October 1851 – 17 October 1924) was a prolific Scottish writer and journalist who published books, pamphlets and articles on history, biography, politics, religion, and other subjects.

response: * Hector Macpherson, Sr. (1875–1970), Canadian-American agricultural economics professor and politician
* Hector Macpherson, Jr. (1918–2015), American farmer and politician
*Hector Macpherson (astronomer) (1888–1956), Scottish clergyman and astronomer, son of Hector C. Macpherson
* Hector Macpherson Sr. (1875–1970), Canadian-American agricultural economics professor and politician
* Hector Macpherson Jr. (1918–2015), American dairy farmer and politician in Oregon, son of Hector Macpherson Sr.
